featured.text: One day, she dusted off the story she had written for the writers’ group and decided to make it into a novel.

other.text: I don’t write a book about how great my family is.

definition.zh_def: 寫作，將文字或符號記錄在紙上或其他媒介上。
definition.en_def: To form letters, words, or symbols on a surface, typically paper, using a pen, pencil, or other writing instrument.
definition.example: She loves to write stories in her free time.
